title: Transition into Multi-view mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game on a day when other games are also available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates down into the in-game scoreboared
AND the user navigates to an accessible game in the in-game scoreboard
AND the user holds down the center button in a long-press fashion to initiate multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player should enter the multi-view mode
AND the additional stream will appear to the right of the main stream
AND all 4 static multi-view spaces will show on the screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the single game player is paused
AND he user navigates down into the in-game scoreboared
AND the user navigates to an accessible game in the in-game scoreboard
AND the user holds down the center button in a long-press fashion to initiate multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the paused stream will start when multi-view is kicked off
AND the additional stream will appear to the right of the main stream
AND all 4 static multi-view spaces will show on the screen

title: Add Stream
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Multi-view Mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the in-game scoreboard is displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN focus should be on the first tile

OR focus should be on the previously selected tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the in-game scoreboard  
AND the user selects a tile for a game that has an accessible feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN playback will begin for that content
AND playback for existing streams should not be interrupted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the in-game scoreboard  
AND the user selects SVOD/SLIVE/MLBN content that is available in the in-game scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN playback will begin for that content
AND playback for existing streams should not be interrupted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the max number of streams are playing (4- the larger feed, plus three to the right)
AND the user selects a tile for a game that has an accessible feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing will happen

title: Feed in multi-view loading
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the multi-view experience
custom_steps: WHEN streams are loading (ie when streams are added or streams switch places)
custom_expected: THEN a spinning baseball icon is rendered while the stream is loading until playback begins

title: Remove Stream
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in multi-view mode with multiple games available on the given day to which the user is  entitled

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the in-game scoreboard is displayed
AND a tile’s content is already playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that tile should have a “Remove” overlay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the in-game scoreboard is displayed
AND the user selects another game that is added as a new multi-view stream
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that tile will display the “Remove” overlay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the in-game scoreboard is displayed
AND a tile’s content is already playing and currently has the "Remove" overlay
AND the user selects the tile
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the player associated with that tile should be removed 
AND the “Remove” overlay will be removed
AND playback for existing streams should not be interrupted

title: Exiting Multiview
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Multi-view Mode

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN there are only two games playing in MV mode 
AND the user selects a game to remove from the MV scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the exit dialog should appear

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN there are two or more games playing in MV mode WHEN the user presses the back button on device remote
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the exit dialog should appear

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN exit dialogue appears
custom_steps_separated.expected:
User is able to toggle between both YES and NO option

Current selection is highlighted by bright white box, but option not selected is transparent

Both YES and NO options are able to be selected by user with intended action occuring

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing multi-view
AND the user has audio focus on game content
AND the user is exits multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will be shown video in the standard single-view game player experience
AND the stream that had audio focus will occupy the single-view game player

AND the video will resume from the same point it was at in multi-view

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is viewing multi-view
AND the user has audio focus on the SLIVE content 
AND the user is exits MV mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will be shown video in the standard single-view game player experience 
AND user will be shown video in the SLIVE player experience

title: Instructional UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the multi-view experience

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is inactive for 5 seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be considered idle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user goes idle
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MV controls presenter will disappear

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is idle 
AND they press the up, left, or right key on
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN MV controls presenter will appear 
AND the user will see the "SINGLE PRESS FOR AUDIO" instructional UI
AND the user will see the "< EXIT MULTIVIEW" instructional UI 
AND  the mainPlayer will regain focus

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a player is focused
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it will have a white border

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the main player or bottom-most MV player is focused
AND the user presses D-down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Scoreboard will be focused

title: Error Handling
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user watching a game in the player
AND the user attempts to access the in-game scoreboard

NOTE: Block mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/search AND statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule in Charles to produce

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN data has never loaded 
AND an exception has been caught 

(Block BEFORE entering Multiview)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN show an error message

“Failure to load, please swing by later.”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN data has previously loaded 
AND an exception has been caught 

(Block AFTER Multiview has already loaded)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show stale scoreboard data

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN an exception has been thrown but subsequent network requests have provided valid data
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN show updated scoreboard data

title: Audio Focus and Switching of the main player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user in the multi-view experience on a day with multiple games to which the user is entitled

NOTE: Proxy https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v3/search and https://statsapi.mlb.com:443/api/v1/schedule with the attached json to simulate a previous day's EPG in event there are not sufficient live or archived games appearing in the EPG to activate multiview

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user clicks the smaller player 
AND the player doesn't have audio focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN give that player audio focus

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user clicks a small MV player 
AND the player does have audio focus
(a double click, essentially)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN swap that players position with the main player
AND maintains audio focus

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user clicks the main player 
AND it doesn't have audio focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN give the main player audio focus

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN any video player has audio focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an audio icon that should appear in the bottom left of the player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN no player is focused
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio icon should not be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user removes the player with audio focus
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the audio focus should go to another player

title: Entering Multi-view Stream Selection and Starting Point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN single stream is home feed 
AND the user enters multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN home feed should propagate to Main player of Multiview

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN single stream is away feed 
AND the user enters multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN away feed should propagate to Main player of Multiview

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Secondary streams are selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN feedSelect logic should determine which feed is used as secondary

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN secondary streams begin
AND the stream is live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the feed will start at the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN secondary streams begin
AND the stream is archived
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the stream will start at the resume point

title: Clicking non-playable content in the scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the multi-view
custom_steps:
WHEN a user clicks content that they cannot play (this can be due to: game does not have media attached yet, user is blacked out, user is un-entitled, content is Apple TV+ content that user cannot watch, postponed, etc)
AND the user selects the content

title: User cannot initiate multi-view with SVOD/SLIVE/MLBN content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the single-game player

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects SVOD/SLIVE/MLBN content from the in-game scoreboard
OR the user selects unplayable content (blacked out, not entitled, no media attached, Apple TV+)
AND attempts to initiate multi-view with a long press
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no action occurs

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects SVOD/SLIVE/MLBN content from the in-game scoreboard
AND the user single presses the content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the SVOD/VOD player opens and the content plays there 
AND the in-game scoreboard will no longer be available as an option

title: Backgrounding the app in multiview
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the multi-view experience

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns to the app within 2 hours
AND the content is live content

NOTE: the 2 hour mark starts from the moment the app is backgrounded
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the multiview experience will resume (loading may be required)
AND the live content will start from the live point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns to the app within 2 hours
AND the content is archived content
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the multiview experience will resume (loading may be required)
AND the archived content will start from the resume point

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns to the app within 2 hours
AND the user attempts to exit multi-view by pressing back or removing enough streams to initiate the exit message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "Are You Sure You Want To Leave MultiView" prompt will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user backgrounds the app
AND then the user returns after 2 hours
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will open to the homepage
